headline: Workday And Insperity Target SMB Growth With New HRScale Partnership
summary: Workday (NasdaqGS:WDAY) and Insperity have launched the Insperity HRScale solution, pairing Workday Human Capital Management with Insperity's full service HR model. The offering targets small and midsized businesses that want enterprise grade HR technology with outsourced support. The launch marks an expansion of Workday's reach beyond larger enterprises into a broader HR technology market. Workday has built its brand around cloud based finance and HR software for larger organizations,...

headline: Baird Lowers Workday (WDAY) Price Target after Reduced 2027 Guidance
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) is included among the 14 Best GARP Stocks to Buy According to Analysts. On February 25, Baird analyst Mark Marcon lowered the price target on Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ:WDAY) to $190 from $195 and maintained an Outperform rating on the shares. The firm updated its model following the company’s Q4 results, which included […]
